1 year ago Report Abuse by jnk686 Member since: October 15, 2007 Total points: 1,320 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker No. If you leave cash on the table then you should write"Cash"on the tip section of the receipt so that the waiter will be aware that there is cash on the table. Plus it fills in the blank to prevent someone else writing something in and later claiming you wrote it.
If no cash left, then use that section on the receipt to write in your tip amount that will be charged to your credit card. 1 year ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: thanks Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting!
